title: Purplebeck
text:
Purplebeck (Korean: 퍼플백), sometimes written as Purple Beck, is a South Korean girl group formed by Majesty Entertainment. They made their debut on June 24, 2019, with the extended play, Crystal Ball. The group currently consists of four members: Yeowool, Yerim, Mini, and Seyeon. Layeon left the group in July 2021.
